website_summaries.verdict: A medium-hold hair spray that does its job without any stiffness or greasy residue.
pros: Holds without being too stiff or sticky
Doesn't leave residue in your hair
cons: Some find the scent to be a bit masculine

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray does indeed have a firm hold. However, I was still able to run my fingers through my shoulder length, thick hair. This hairspray also has a strong fragrance. I find the fragrance quite pleasant, but it is strong nonetheless. If you are sensitive to fragrances, this may not be your best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Falls Girl

customer_reviews.title: Chi Enviro 54 is the best salon spray available
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Chi Envro 54 hairspray for years. It is super fine and comes out dry and never feel heavy or sticky. Even I You get your hair wet, it will not glue your hair together. I have super fine blonde straight hair and there is very few hairspray that hold without weighing it down or making it gunky or making my blonde hair look dark. I will never use any other hairspray and I had tried hundreds of salon spray before I found Chi Envito 54.
customer_reviews.author: Wynn

customer_reviews.title: The BEST hairspray for keeping your hold, but not gunking up your hair!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best hair spray to keep curls ALL day long, without leaving that nasty sticky feeling that so many hairsprays do. The smell is great too; kind of smells like a man's cologne, but not enough to make YOU smell like a guy! I have really long hair that I curl with a large curling iron (1 1/2" barrel) and I get tons of compliments on how my hair stays 'done' all day... My thanks goes out to CHI; this is the only hairspray I have used for the last 5+ years, and the compliments that I receive go to you!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS PICTURED
customer_reviews.text: The bottle I received is not as pictured. This bottle is posted as "Danger Extremely Flammable". I have purchased this product from Salon's many times and this warning is never on the bottle. I don't believe this product is a true CHI product. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: Best hairspray ever
customer_reviews.text: Best hairspray ever! I have extremely thick hair, cut into a choppy bob, and this provides excellent texture and hold. The smell isn't offensive either. This is my third time purchasing this size from this seller, and I will continue to repurchase until it isn't available any longer. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Right Hold
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes this spray, she had me order it for her. She used to get it at beauty shop, but it is cheaper at Amazon. We wish it was cheaper than this, still seems high price. It’s a good product she says, because it holds good , but she said it’s not like helmet head hair spray that feels stiff like a screen on your head. This size may not be best size for traveling. Might look for a smaller size . Bottle is tall , but is fine for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Mearn

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairspray, it is my favorite. I used Big Sexy for years until there was none at the store on a particular shopping trip, so I bought CHI instead. This works way better! It holds my hair style all day without making it look stiff or crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: C Becker

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's a staple in my daily routine. Shiny touchable waves!
customer_reviews.author: OC Girl

customer_reviews.title: BEST HAIRSPRAY!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t like to use hairspray due to the sticky and stiffness but this hairspray totally changed my mind! I love how it makes my hair look and feel and it’s the only hairspray that has allowed my curls to last days! Highly recommend it! Btw- the can is crazy large!
customer_reviews.author: Camilla

customer_reviews.title: too crunchy
customer_reviews.text: I just recently began using hairspray. First can was from John Frieda but it began to permanently coat my hair with a horrible white residue. Had to use special shampoo to get it out. So then I bought this Chi spray along with Moroccan Oil, both firm hold. The Chi left my hair very dry shiny and crunchy like a shellac so I won't use it again. The Moroccan Oil is by far the best of any I've tried... it has enough holding power but also leaves hair fairly soft and natural.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this works to keep ones hair in place on windy days for sure
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Doering

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical given the price but it’s completely worth it
customer_reviews.text: My sister in law told me about this spray - I was skeptical given the price but it’s completely worth it. It doesn’t give that hard texture that normal spray does, you only need small amounts.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price the first time I bought it...should have bought 2 then. Would have if I knew it was going to be double the price on reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glue
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate hairspray! It is the BEST hairspray ever. Every single hair will stay put on my hair for the entire day. It might as well be glue!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Tivnan

customer_reviews.title: Better packing
customer_reviews.text: Always receive this type of aerosol cans with the sprayer dis attached and lids off. Luckily attaching sprayer enables spray to work. Poor packaging. Extra packing would prevent this. Lids have been cracked before
customer_reviews.author: Debbie King

customer_reviews.title: Spray nozzle clogs all the time
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed I could not get the soft hold. This is like putting glue in your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Bship67

customer_reviews.title: Not good hold
customer_reviews.text: Product makes hair shine. And smells great But does not hold your style what so ever ive used 2 bottles over a period of time w other stronger hold hairsprays. Will not hold your curls
customer_reviews.author: ann baker

customer_reviews.title: Chi is the way to be!
customer_reviews.text: All Time favorite hair spray at the perfect price! Paid palmist $20 at the salon and only $11 on Amazon! I'll take that savings any day!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Great product for hold.
customer_reviews.text: I use this brand and use the firm style. Does not flake and does not leave that sticky feeling most others do. Don’t need much as it hold very well.
customer_reviews.author: brneyes7190

customer_reviews.title: CHI Strong Hair
customer_reviews.text: This hair spray keeps my hair in place without stiffness and helps keep my hair style in ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great hold.  Men’s cologne smell
customer_reviews.text: Good hairspray. Natural feel hold. Smells like a mans cologne which I don’t care for but it’s not a stinky smell
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S Black

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Extremely firm hairspray. My shoulder length hair MUST be washed after using this spray
customer_reviews.author: MarthaMary

customer_reviews.title: Best hairspray ever
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray actually does what all hairspray should do. Not going back to anything else at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Went in the trash
customer_reviews.text: My opinion is that this is a knock off. I’ve used this hairspray for years and this did not smell the same and the hold feels different. I am cutting my losses with this purchase and I bought the real deal from Utla.
customer_reviews.author: Daisyifudo

customer_reviews.title: Favorite hair spray
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairspray. Strong hold without being sticky. Smells really nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia Brangan

customer_reviews.title: I think it is the best hair spray I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing about Chi hair spray that I don't like. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great hold
customer_reviews.text: Spray once and my hair holds up all day, even when it's windy. When first applied hair feels stiff but the stiffness disappears very quickly but the hair still stays where I want it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this item. It keeps my hair in place, but it also doesn't make the hair for a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Zeek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell but you’ve got to be careful if you have longer hair. It gets sticky.
customer_reviews.author: CASSIDY BIBLE

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Holds hair for most of day as needed. Would buy again. Doesn't make your hair stink or stiff.
customer_reviews.author: L. Frey

customer_reviews.title: This is the bomb. Not crusty, just keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the bomb. Not crusty, just keeps your locks in check.
customer_reviews.author: Spiritual Collections

customer_reviews.title: The Best Hairspray
customer_reviews.text: Firm if you use more, brushable if you use less. This is my only hairspray because it's got a very fine spray and smells great! Whenever I use something else I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Perkins

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Best hair spray I have used in a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable product for fine thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: Good hold for fine thin hair without weighing it down. Fragrance is also nice.

customer_reviews.title: Great hairspray!
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray works great. So glad I purchased it. I’ll be buying more.

customer_reviews.title: Love this hairspray
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Great holding power. Larger can, not ideal for travel but worth the purchase for at home use. (I always check my luggage so I travel with it!)

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hairspray
customer_reviews.text: Does not make your hair feel like straw. Very natural look and feel. Smells great

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying this for about almost a year now and it lasts a long time and it works well. It isn't too heavy on my hair and it holds!

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad Hairspray!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sprays are always being discontinued. I tried this one, and I like it pretty well. It certainly is not stiff, and I would say it's more of a light to medium hold.

customer_reviews.title: Stron hold and nice smell
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray has indeed firm hold and fragrance is quite pleasant.

customer_reviews.text: Hair spray has great all day hold. My friend gave me her bottled. I loved it so I purchased one on amazon. Fast shipping and good packaging.

customer_reviews.text: Best hairspray. Does not leave your hair sticky and really holds your hair in place just the way you want it!

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments about how my hair smells. Holds good too, I just use a little to keep some curl in my hair.

customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it helps with coating the hair before straightening and or drying

customer_reviews.text: I like the hold your hair stays put even in the wind, it smells good. I found out about it from my hairdresser.

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair spray! Same price as Ulta or Sephora. It smells amazing! I find it gives a nice hold without being too stiff or crunchy.

customer_reviews.title: Great hairspray
customer_reviews.text: Love this hairspray for my son and husband. It smells neutral to manly and does a great job. No flaking either.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this product for a few years and amazon generally has great prices. I save $$ by purchasing several cans at once.

customer_reviews.title: Great hold & scent!
customer_reviews.text: Love the hold & scent of this hairspray! Will definitely buy again.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd order did not meet same quality as 1st purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Updated (after second product use 11/8/016) I purchased it after having all of the experiences in my past review (mentioned below in 1st purchase.) It still has almost all quality as past but it does not shines my hair like the 1st purchase did and smells different than my 1st purchase. Overall 3 star! (1st purchase experience) Exceeded my expectations 1) My hair shines with every use of this product. 2)Unlike many other similar hairspray (similar price), this product gave 0 (zero) dandruff on my hair. 3) Smooth and firm hold at the same time 4) Quality product within a budget.

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite hair spray
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite hair spray. Price is great compared to local superstore.

customer_reviews.text: This product is the best I’ve ever used! Lightweight and not sticky and it holds the curl ALL day!

customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years and love it. Now getting it delivered to the house is so much more convenient.

customer_reviews.text: I love this hair spray :) I have very thick hair, and this spray holds it very well. And the plus side, is that it smells good :)

customer_reviews.title: Best Hairspray Ever!
customer_reviews.text: If I want extra hold then this is my go to (normally I use the Natural Hold to style). Love Chi hairspray products. Price is excellent compared to the big box stores.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Holds great!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been trying to get me to try this forever! It is fantastic!

customer_reviews.title: Love CHI
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray works great! I have thin fine hair and this hairspray holds it well without weighing it down or being too sticky;
customer_reviews.author: C. Erisman

customer_reviews.title: Hair Spray
customer_reviews.text: I think this is one of the best hairsprays on the market. It holds all day, but brushes out at night. Hair doesn't feel "dirty."
customer_reviews.author: Judy in Granbury

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hair spray
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this hair spray by my stylist several years ago. I am very glad to see that Amazon Prime carries this. This is the best hair spray that I have ever used, and I am very particular about hair sprays. It must have a nice (finely misting) and unclogging nozzle. It cannot have white powder as I have dark color hair. It must have strong hold for 8 hours, but cannot make me look like I am wearing a helmet. Finally, it must have great smell. This spray delivers on all fronts. I find it as long as I spray from 8 inches to 1 foot away, it gives fantastic result.
customer_reviews.author: tmok2000

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hairspray! Not too sticky, yet it gives my hair body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 year old daughter. She can be picky about everything so I was very pleased when she told me she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: sa from NH

customer_reviews.title: Great hold that won't flatten your hair!
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight and strong holding hairspray works great and will not weigh your hair down when you have fine hair. I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: chad h

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great firm hairspray! Holds great in humidity and it smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Great for Thick Hair
customer_reviews.text: Great for thick hair! Holds your hair in place without looking crunchy or having "helmet head." Able to be brushed out and reapplied.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee T.

customer_reviews.title: I like all CHI hair products
customer_reviews.text: It is a holding spray that does not leave my hair stiff. I like all CHI hair products.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - doesn't seem like the same product
customer_reviews.text: Does not match the same quality of product I've bought before - very sticky, as if the can was stored improperly.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I'm on the fence with this one
customer_reviews.text: I like the hold that the Chi spray has, but it definitely leaves a strange texture/build up on my hair. Great scent!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a good spray but I ordered the wrong one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Scheibe

customer_reviews.title: Light, but Strong!
customer_reviews.text: It goes on light but holds well. Doesn't have a strong scent so it doesn't smell. I use it every day and love it. My only issue is it's so tall it doesn't really for in my cabinets. So I just have to leave it out on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: taylabalad

customer_reviews.title: I'm looking for something thats pretty much like glue
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking for something with more hold. I'm looking for something thats pretty much like glue.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good hairspray
customer_reviews.text: I first came across this hairspray from my hairstylist. Then I found some at TJMaxx super cheap so I bought a can. I loved the first bottle of it, so next time I was at TJMaxx I bought every bottle they had, LOL! But since then I dont know if the texture of my hair has changed or what, but I don't like it anymore. It smells great but I ended up giving all of them to my Mom who does still love this! This is the only CHI hairspray I've ever tried so I can't really compare it to any other hairspray they offer. Maybe I'll try a firmer spray next time I want to try a CHI hairspray.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite hairspray. Every time I try something new, I come right back to CHI
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. Garlock

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I love Chi in general, but this product was good.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: One of the best hairsprays ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this hairspray for several years. Although it is more pricey than the 'drugstore' brands, it is totally worth it- smells great, does not flake, and just does an awesome job. Holds hair in place and you can even use it as spray right before you flat iron.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Firm hold, but not overly firm.  LOVE this hairspray!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this hair spray for 3+ years, and I pray it's never discontinued! It has a good firm hold, but it's not heavy on your hair. If you want a heavy firm hold, use Chi's Helmet Head. My hair still has bounce and doesn't look like it's plastered with hair spray. I have long hair and use hot rollers every day. This product holds the curls well throughout the day. It does not have an overpowering scent like so many hair sprays do. I'm very sensitive to smells, and this doesn't bother me at all. It's just a nice, light, fresh scent. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dawny Bear

customer_reviews.title: Used this product for several years
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years. Used to buy it from my hair stylist. However, because of the pandemic I have been ordering from Amazon and have actually put it on my prescribe and save order. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: fine hair and it's important to have a hairspray that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, fine hair and it's important to have a hairspray that doesn't damage it. I love the smell, the hold and the feel of this CHI product--even my family tries to steal it from me!

customer_reviews.title: Soft hold
customer_reviews.text: Holds my hair well and yet it is not stiff

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my baby-fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my baby-fine hair. The style lasts for most of the day - no lingering scent and your hair does not feel "glued" in place.

product_meta.title: CHI Enviro 54 Firm Hold Hair Spray, 12 Oz
product_meta.description:
Style holding memory, fast drying hair spray is an innovative new technology that is ideal for all your finishing and hard to hold styles. You can spray, scrunch, mold and hold to create multitudes of styles without added weight. Ideal for blow-dry styling and finishing. Enriched with silk proteins and natural herbs, it provides incredible shine.

BRAND STORY
By CHI
feature_bullets: Firm hold hair spray that is great for locking in and securing finished styles
To Use: Hold can 10-12 inches from hair, spray on evenly, avoid eye contact

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
